changeSet.createView: SELECT ORG.ID, ORG.NAME, ORG.ALTERNATE_NAME, ORG.ACCOUNT_ID, CONF.RECENT AS LAST_UPDATED, COALESCE(CONF.RECOMMENDED, 0) AS RECOMMENDED, COALESCE(CONF.RECENT, TIMESTAMP '1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS RECENT FROM ORGANIZATION ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT RESOURCE_ID, COUNT(RESOURCE_ID) RECOMMENDED, MAX(STATE_DATE) RECENT FROM CONFLICT WHERE STATE = 'PENDING' GROUP BY RESOURCE_ID) CONF ON ORG.ID = CONF.RESOURCE_ID WHERE ORG.ACTIVE IS TRUE
